post.summary: Inserts a collection of log entries, each in a specific JSON format.
post.description:
OAuth required scopes: OR.Monitoring or OR.Monitoring.Write.

Required permissions: (Logs.Create).

Example of log entry:
     {
         "message": "TTT execution started",
         "level": "Information",
         "timeStamp": "2017-01-18T14:46:07.4152893+02:00",
         "windowsIdentity": "DESKTOP-1L50L0P\\WindowsUser",
         "agentSessionId": "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000",
         "processName": "TTT",
         "fileName": "Main",
         "jobId": "8066c309-cef8-4b47-9163-b273fc14cc43"
     }

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Collection of string representations of JSON objects

schema.description: Collection of string representations of JSON objects

400.description: logs is null or an Exception is thrown during insert

408.description: Too many pending logging requests or timeout
